You know what's good about this phase? It's so fast, nobody even cares to read all the effort we put into this. We try to be ourselves, to express our thoughts and show off our personality, to stand out from the crowd, even in the smallest of details like this fast, almost insignificant phase of swapping cards. But the more we try to stand out, the more we're being drowned by our own identities. When you enter this place, people instantly ask "What do you bring to the table that's never seen before?" while at the same time, the management is very wary of who and what they allow in this fine establishment. I respect their authority, since they've been running this place for Бог knows how long. And it's going well, so they must be doing something right. However, whenever a new face shows up trying to improve the place, some see it as a possible threat, while others are far more logical and analyitcal on their approach. Is this person known and beloved by the masses? Then they shall be allowed, well, as long as they comply with the basic rules. Rules that, I must say, I completely adhere to. Especially the one where they refuse anything that's not consensual. That alone made me respect them a lot, since the bases for a responsible sex life are safety, sanity and consent. However, they are still human, and they still fear the new faces that might bring new ideals if they're relatively unknown or have a bad reputation. As my dear Dostoyevsky once said: "Taking a new step, uttering a new word, is what people fear most." And yet, slowly but surely, they give their best attempt to embrace with open arms all different kinds of kinks and fetishes, as long as they're not dangerous. And that alone makes this place a place I want to be in. A place where Polina Geist can feel safe, and wants to contribute nothing but good fun and laughs. Well, this is where this small rant of mine ends. Congratulations if you've read all this, it means a lot to me. Now, why don't we keep playing and enjoy ourselves? I can't wait to share some laughs, lose my clothes and get down to it like a wild cockatrice in a shopping mall!
